name: jaak-visage
summary: AI-powered face detection and recording library for iOS using Vision Framework
description:
JAAKVisage is an advanced face detection library that provides:
- Real-time face detection using Vision Framework
- Auto-recording with quality analysis
- Face quality metrics and validation
- Security monitoring and device validation
- Video recording with real-time face analysis
- Comprehensive error handling with recovery
- Improved preview rotation behavior with followInterface as default
- Fixed orientation handling when device is flat (faceUp/faceDown)
